name: Latency: The Game: The Prototype
description:
"Latency: The Game" is an experimental game made for Mini Ludum Dare 40, which may be expanded some time in the future (more downloads = more motivation to expand and improve the game!).

"Latency" is a platformer-style game with a twist... there's 2 seconds of lag between your controls and the character's movements! Once you get the hang of it, try to collect all three Crystals, and skip all the checkpoints possible to achieve a perfect game!

Like the game? Let me know by sharing it and getting more people to download it! If there is enough interest in the game, I will improve and expand the world into a full-fledged frustrating-as-heck platformer!

Questions/Comments? Just wanna say hi? Tweet me @BipolarMike, or e-mail me at BipolarDesign [at] Gmail [dot] com

Download for free below, or donate towards my game-makin' funds if you wish :)
